title: Personalized Mathematics Learning Design Using Concept Mapping

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic arithmetic operations and geometric concepts
context.additional_context: Blended instruction exploring personalized learning pathways using personal devices in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can select learning priorities in a concept map with 80% accuracy through self-assessment.
Learners achieve mastery of core mathematical concepts at over 90% proficiency by following the generated personalized learning path.
Learners can write a report explaining the interconnectedness of concepts through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
